nodes.text: Bo-Katan Kryze's armor was a suit of Mandalorian armor worn by the Mandalorian Bo-Katan Kryze. According to Kryze, the armor had been in her family for three generations. Her Nite Owl helmet was painted blue and grey, which matched her armor. Before the Siege of Mandalore, Kryze's helmet had been repainted with new markings.
